name: github-api
description: Interact with the GitHub API to manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and search code. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: github_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the GitHub API to manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and search code. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: get_repo (get repository details), list_repos (list user repos), get_issue (get issue details), list_issues (list issues in a repo), create_issue (create a new issue), get_pull_request (get PR details), list_pull_requests (list PRs in a repo), search_code (search code across repos)

owner.description: Repository owner (username or org). Required for repo, issue, and PR actions.

repo.description: Repository name. Required for repo, issue, and PR actions.

issueNumber.description: Issue number (positive integer). Required for get_issue.

prNumber.description: Pull request number (positive integer). Required for get_pull_request.

title.description: Issue title (max 256 chars). Required for create_issue.

body.description: Issue body text (max 65536 chars). Optional for create_issue.

labels.description: Array of label strings. Optional for create_issue.

query.description: Search query (max 256 chars). Required for search_code.

state.description: Filter by state (default: open). Used for list_issues and list_pull_requests.

sort.description: Sort order. Varies by action: list_repos (updated|created|pushed|full_name), list_issues (created|updated|comments), list_pull_requests (created|updated|popularity).

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100, default: 30).
